mapper.select: SELECT fbno, cno, fbhit, fbsubject, nick, content, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, num FROM (SELECT fbno, cno, fbhit, fbsubject, nick, content, regdate, rownum as num FROM (SELECT fbno, cno, fbhit, fbsubject, nick, content, regdate FROM freeboard WHERE cno LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT fbno, cno, fbhit, fbsubject, nick, content, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, num FROM (SELECT fbno, cno, fbhit, fbsubject, nick, content, regdate, rownum as num FROM (SELECT fbno, cno, fbhit, fbsubject, nick, content, regdate FROM freeboard WHERE ${option} LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' AND cno LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freeboard WHERE cno LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freeboard WHERE ${option} LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' AND cno LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(fbno)+1, 1) FROM freeboard), #{fbsubject}, #{cno}, #{id}, #{nick}, #{content}, #{fbphoto}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE freeboard SET fbhit=fbhit+1 WHERE fbno=#{fbno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freereply WHERE fbno=#{fbno}
